headline: Edison International Provides Update on Ongoing Investigation into Eaton Fire Origin
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., March 14, 2025--Edison International’s subsidiary, Southern California Edison, will begin the next phase of physical and video inspections and testing of electrical equipment in Eaton Canyon on March 17. This phase of testing will continue for several weeks in the field, followed by lab and engineering analysis.
